text: John Fitzgerald O'Dowd (born 10 May 1967) is an Irish Sinn Féin politician. He has been the Minister for Infrastructure since 16 May 2022 and the Member of the Northern Ireland Assembly for Upper Bann since 2003. He was the Minister for Education from 2011 to 2016. He was the deputy First Minister in 2011 for a short time. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Sinn Féin members of the Northern Ireland Assembly
title: John O'Dowd
